Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393611) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393611)
